## isGenericMessage() function

Determines whether something is a [GenericMessage](./scripthost-core.genericmessage.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isGenericMessage<T extends string>(thing: unknown, type?: string): thing is GenericMessage<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  thing | unknown | The thing to test |
|  type | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Optionally specifies the message type to test |

<b>Returns:</b>

thing is [GenericMessage](./scripthost-core.genericmessage.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;
